description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的中国工农红军主力从长江以南各革命根据地向陕甘革命根据地进行的战略转移。
description.en: A strategic retreat undertaken by the Red Army of the Communist Party of China to evade the pursuit of the Kuomintang army.

description.zh-cn: 1927年至1937年间，由中国国民党与中国共产党之间爆发的内战。
description.en: A civil war fought between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China from 1927 to 1937.

description.zh-cn: 领导中国工农红军进行长征的政党。
description.en: The political party that led the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army on the Long March.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1927年至1937年间领导的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Communist Party of China from 1927 to 1937.

zh-cn: 中央苏区第五次反围剿战争

description.zh-cn: 国民政府对中共中央苏区发动的第五次军事围剿，其失利是红军开始长征的直接原因。
description.en: The fifth encirclement campaign launched by the Nationalist Government against the Central Soviet Area of the CCP, the failure of which was the direct cause for the start of the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党及中华人民共和国的主要领导人。在遵义会议后恢复对红军的领导权，并在长征中逐步确立其核心领导地位。
description.en: A key leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China. He regained leadership over the Red Army after the Zunyi Conference and gradually established his core leadership position during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 长征途中召开的中共中央政治局扩大会议，纠正了博古、李德等人的“左倾”军事路线，确立了毛泽东在党和红军中的领导地位。
description.en: An enlarged meeting of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee held during the Long March, which corrected the 'leftist' military line of Bo Gu and Li De, and established Mao Zedong's leadership position in the party and the Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央总负责人，与李德共同为第五次反围剿战争的失败负主要责任，在遵义会议上被剥夺最高军事指挥权。
description.en: The de facto head of the CCP at the time, who, along with Li De, was held primarily responsible for the failure of the Fifth Anti-Encirclement Campaign and was stripped of supreme military command at the Zunyi Conference.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际派往中国的军事顾问，因不了解中国战场特点，其军事指挥导致第五次反围剿战争失败，在遵义会议上被剥夺军事指挥权。
description.en: A military advisor sent by the Comintern to China. His lack of understanding of the Chinese battlefield led to the failure of the Fifth Anti-Encirclement Campaign, and he was stripped of military command at the Zunyi Conference.

en: First Front Army of the Chinese Red Army

description.zh-cn: 由中共中央和中革军委直接领导的红军主力部队，是长征的核心力量。
description.en: The main force of the Red Army directly led by the CCP Central Committee and the Central Revolutionary Military Commission, serving as the core force of the Long March.

en: Second Front Army of the Chinese Red Army

description.zh-cn: 由红二军团和红六军团会合后组成，由贺龙、任弼时领导。
description.en: Formed by the merger of the Second and Sixth Army Corps, led by He Long and Ren Bishi.

en: Fourth Front Army of the Chinese Red Army

description.zh-cn: 由张国焘、徐向前、陈昌浩领导的红军主力之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Red Army, led by Zhang Guotao, Xu Xiangqian, and Chen Changhao.

description.zh-cn: 红一、二、四方面军在甘肃会宁地区会师，标志着长征的结束。
description.en: The rendezvous of the First, Second, and Fourth Front Armies of the Red Army in the Huining area of Gansu, marking the end of the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 时任国民政府军事委员会委员长，领导国民革命军对红军进行“围剿”和“追剿”。
description.en: Then Chairman of the Military Affairs Commission of the Nationalist Government, who led the National Revolutionary Army in the 'encirclement' and 'pursuit' campaigns against the Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国训政时期的中央政府与最高行政机关，由中国国民党领导。
description.en: The central government and highest administrative body of the Republic of China during the period of political tutelage, led by the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府所属的国家军队，在长征期间负责围剿和追击红军。
description.en: The national army of the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China, responsible for encircling and pursuing the Red Army during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的执政党，领导国民政府和国民革命军。
description.en: The ruling party of the Republic of China, leading the Nationalist Government and the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 红四方面军主要领导人。在与红一方面军会师后，因路线分歧另立中央，后被迫取消。
description.en: A key leader of the Fourth Front Army. After joining forces with the First Front Army, he established a separate party central committee due to strategic disagreements, which was later forced to be dissolved.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党重要领导人。长征初期是“三人团”成员之一，遵义会议后成为军事指挥者之一，后与毛泽东、王稼祥组成新的“三人团”。
description.en: An important leader of the CCP. He was a member of the 'Trio' at the beginning of the Long March, became one of the military commanders after the Zunyi Conference, and later formed a new 'Trio' with Mao Zedong and Wang Jiaxiang.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军总司令，长征期间重要的军事领导人。
description.en: Commander-in-Chief of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and an important military leader during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 遵义会议后接替博古在党内负总责（任中共中央总书记），是中国共产党在长征时期的重要领导人。
description.en: After the Zunyi Conference, he replaced Bo Gu to take overall responsibility in the party (as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee), and was an important leader of the CCP during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 红四方面军总指挥，长征期间重要的军事领导人。
description.en: Commander-in-Chief of the Fourth Front Army and an important military leader during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 红四方面军政治委员，长征期间重要的政治领导人。
description.en: Political Commissar of the Fourth Front Army and an important political leader during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 红二方面军总指挥，长征期间重要的军事领导人。
description.en: Commander-in-Chief of the Second Front Army and an important military leader during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 红二方面军政治委员，长征期间重要的政治领导人。
description.en: Political Commissar of the Second Front Army and an important political leader during the Long March.

en: 25th Army of the Chinese Red Army

description.zh-cn: 作为“北上抗日第二先遣队”，独立进行长征并最先到达陕北的红军部队。
description.en: As the 'Second Vanguard Detachment to Resist Japan in the North', it was the Red Army unit that independently undertook its own Long March and was the first to arrive in northern Shaanxi.

description.zh-cn: 陕甘革命根据地的主要创建者和领导者之一。
description.en: One of the main founders and leaders of the Shaan-Gan Revolutionary Base.

description.zh-cn: 位于陕西、甘肃边界地区的革命根据地，是红军长征的最终目的地。
description.en: A revolutionary base area located on the border of Shaanxi and Gansu provinces, which was the final destination of the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 中央红军在长征途中突破国民革命军第四道封锁线的战役，也是长征中最惨烈的一战。
description.en: A battle in which the Central Red Army broke through the fourth blockade line of the National Revolutionary Army during the Long March, and it was the most tragic battle of the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 遵义会议后，中央红军在贵州、四川、云南三省交界地区四次渡过赤水河的军事行动，是长征中以少胜多、变被动为主动的光辉战例。
description.en: After the Zunyi Conference, the Central Red Army crossed the Chishui River four times in the border area of Guizhou, Sichuan, and Yunnan provinces. It is a brilliant example of defeating a superior enemy and turning a passive situation into an active one during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军总参谋长，长征期间与彝族首领小叶丹结盟，使红军顺利通过彝族区。
description.en: Chief of the General Staff of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army. During the Long March, he formed an alliance with the Yi leader Xiao Yedan, allowing the Red Army to pass safely through the Yi region.

description.zh-cn: 彝族沽基族首领，与刘伯承在彝海结盟，帮助红军顺利通过彝族聚居区。
description.en: Leader of the Guji clan of the Yi people, who formed a sworn brotherhood with Liu Bocheng at Yihai, helping the Red Army to pass smoothly through the Yi residential area.

description.zh-cn: 长征期间任红军前敌指挥部参谋长，在张国焘与毛泽东分裂时起到了关键作用。
description.en: Served as the Chief of Staff of the Red Army's Frontline Command during the Long March and played a crucial role during the split between Zhang Guotao and Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 由红四方面军主力渡过黄河后组成的部队，奉命执行宁夏战役计划，在河西走廊几乎全军覆没。
description.en: A force formed by the main units of the Fourth Front Army after crossing the Yellow River, tasked with executing the Ningxia Campaign Plan. It was nearly annihilated in the Hexi Corridor.

description.zh-cn: 由张学良、杨虎城发动的“兵谏”，促成了国共第二次合作和抗日民族统一战线的形成，标志着第一次国共内战的结束。
description.en: A 'remonstrance by military force' launched by Zhang Xueliang and Yang Hucheng, which led to the Second Kuomintang-Communist cooperation and the formation of the Anti-Japanese National United Front, marking the end of the First Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军将领，在长征期间率部对红军进行围堵。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army who led his troops to encircle and block the Red Army during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军将领，担任追剿军总司令，在长征期间对红军进行追击。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army who served as the Commander-in-Chief of the Pursuit Army, pursuing the Red Army during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党重要领导人，在遵义会议上支持毛泽东，后与毛泽东、周恩来组成新的“三人团”。
description.en: An important leader of the CCP who supported Mao Zedong at the Zunyi Conference and later formed the new 'Trio' with Mao Zedong and Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 由于在第五次围剿战争中失利，中国工农红军被迫开始长征进行战略转移。
description.en: Due to the defeat in the Fifth Encirclement Campaign, the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army was forced to begin the Long March as a strategic retreat.

description.zh-cn: 在长征期间，国民革命军对中国工农红军进行了持续的围剿和追击。
description.en: During the Long March, the National Revolutionary Army continuously encircled and pursued the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 长征是由中国共产党领导的军事战略转移。
description.en: The Long March was a military strategic retreat led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 遵义会议确立了毛泽东在党和红军中的领导地位，恢复了其军事指挥权。
description.en: The Zunyi Conference established Mao Zedong's leadership position in the Party and the Red Army, restoring his military command authority.

description.zh-cn: 遵义会议取消了博古的最高军事指挥权，后由张闻天接替其在党内负总责。
description.en: The Zunyi Conference stripped Bo Gu of his supreme military command, and he was later replaced by Zhang Wentian to take overall responsibility in the party.

description.zh-cn: 遵义会议取消了李德的最高军事指挥权。
description.en: The Zunyi Conference stripped Li De of his supreme military command.

description.zh-cn: 遵义会议后，张闻天接替博古在党内负总责。
description.en: After the Zunyi Conference, Zhang Wentian replaced Bo Gu to take overall responsibility in the party.

description.zh-cn: 在红一、四方面军会师后，张国焘与毛泽东在北上还是南下的战略方针上产生严重分歧，并另立中央，宣布开除毛泽东党籍。
description.en: After the First and Fourth Front Armies rendezvoused, Zhang Guotao had serious disagreements with Mao Zedong over the strategic direction of going north versus south, established a separate party central committee, and announced the expulsion of Mao Zedong from the party.

description.zh-cn: 张国焘在另立中央后，宣布开除周恩来等人的党籍。
description.en: After establishing his separate central committee, Zhang Guotao announced the expulsion of Zhou Enlai and others from the party.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央总负责人博古支持李德的错误军事指挥，被认为对第五次反围剿战争的失败负有主要责任。
description.en: As the de facto head of the CCP Central Committee, Bo Gu supported Li De's erroneous military command and was considered primarily responsible for the failure of the Fifth Anti-Encirclement Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际军事顾问李德采取“短促突击”战术，与国民革命军打阵地战和消耗战，导致第五次反围剿战争失败。
description.en: Comintern military advisor Li De adopted 'short, swift thrusts' tactics, engaging in positional and attritional warfare with the National Revolutionary Army, which led to the failure of the Fifth Anti-Encirclement Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 红一方面军与红四方面军在四川懋功达维会师。
description.en: The First Front Army and the Fourth Front Army rendezvoused at Dawei, Maogong, Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 红二方面军与红四方面军在四川甘孜会师。
description.en: The Second Front Army and the Fourth Front Army rendezvoused in Ganzi, Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 红军三大主力在会宁地区会师，标志着长征的结束。
description.en: The rendezvous of the three main forces of the Red Army in the Huining area marked the end of the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 中央红军在湘江战役中损失惨重，兵力从出发时的八万余人锐减至三万余人。
description.en: The Central Red Army suffered heavy losses in the Battle of the Xiang River, with its forces reduced from over 80,000 at the start to just over 30,000.

description.zh-cn: 刘伯承与彝族首领小叶丹在彝海结盟，使红军得以顺利通过彝族聚居区。
description.en: Liu Bocheng formed a sworn brotherhood with the Yi leader Xiao Yedan at Yihai, which allowed the Red Army to pass smoothly through the Yi residential area.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东的指挥下，中央红军通过四渡赤水的机动作战，摆脱了国民革命军的围追堵截。
description.en: Under Mao Zedong's command, the Central Red Army, through the mobile warfare of crossing the Chishui River four times, broke free from the encirclement and pursuit of the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 蒋介石部署并指挥国民革命军对长征中的红军进行围追堵截。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek deployed and commanded the National Revolutionary Army to encircle, pursue, and intercept the Red Army during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 红二十五军是第一支到达陕甘革命根据地的长征部队，与当地的红二十六、二十七军会师，巩固了根据地。
description.en: The 25th Red Army was the first Long March unit to arrive at the Shaan-Gan Revolutionary Base, where it joined with the local 26th and 27th Red Armies, consolidating the base.

description.zh-cn: 长征结束后，由红四方面军主力组成的西路军奉命西渡黄河，执行宁夏战役计划。
description.en: After the Long March concluded, the Western Route Army, composed of the main force of the Fourth Front Army, was ordered to cross the Yellow River to execute the Ningxia Campaign Plan.

description.zh-cn: 西安事变的和平解决结束了第一次国共内战，促成了抗日民族统一战线的形成。
description.en: The peaceful resolution of the Xi'an Incident ended the First Chinese Civil War and facilitated the formation of the Anti-Japanese National United Front.
